longBusinessSummary: Ship Healthcare Holdings, Inc. engages in the medical, healthcare, welfare, and nursing care businesses worldwide. It operates through four segments: Total Pack Produce Business, Medical Supply Business, Lifecare Business, and Dispensing Pharmacy Business. The Total Pack Produce segment engages in the sale of medical devices and medical equipment based on bulk orders; offering consulting services on medicine, healthcare, welfare, and nursing care facilities; operates veterinary hospitals; development, sale, and maintenance of medical information systems; and leasing of real estate to medical facilities and other tenants, as well as. manufactures, constructs, and maintains medical gas piping equipment, operating room interiors, shadowless lights for surgery, rehabilitation equipment, special bathtubs, etc. The Medical Supply segment sells medical supplies and specified insurance medical supplies. The Life Care segment operates nursing homes, group homes, etc., and provides meal services. The Dispensing Pharmacy segment operates dispensing pharmacies. The company was incorporated in 1992 and is headquartered in Suita, Japan.
